name: The Gray Man (artechnaut)
description:
PREMISE

In 1941, the "Argentine Nostradamus" Benjamín Solari Parravicini made a psychographic that illustrated the arrival of The Gray Man, the one who, through a great revolution, would bring justice and prosperity to the Argentine people. More than 80 years have passed since then. Currently, Argentina is going through a period of darkness and catastrophe. Just when all hope for the future seemed to evaporate, a mysterious guy with bulging hair and a temper of steel appears to confront the oppressors who enslave the Argentine people. Could it be the prophetic gray man? 

GAMEPLAY

  • Take control of our intrepid hero and travel across Argentina from end to end waking up lions that will join the fight against repression and the status quo. 
  • Defeat the hordes of lukewarm pigeons that will try to fence the way to freedom.
  •  Collect bitcoins that will be used to finance your final campaign in search of your "french revolution" 
  • Visit emblematic places of the Argentine Republic, such as the Iguazú Falls, the Humahuaca Ravine, the Valley of the Moon and the Perito Moreno Glacier, among others.

FEATURES

The Gray Man is a 2D platformer with pixel art graphics and a retro 8-bit style soundtrack. At this time the game is in a development phase, so it only has a total of 5 scenarios and is supported by Windows and Linux operating systems. You can download it in English or Spanish

CREDITS

Thanks to Kenney for his contribution in the graphic section of the game.
